messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Research Director's Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a horde of [REDACTED] have stampeded into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Atmospherics.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: What's up boys. I'm the Captain. If you got any problems just PDA message me.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, not more than 15 energy draining parasites have stampeded into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
